{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:12.940
    | text      = I'm in a Lamadeline French restaurant, not a fancy French restaurant, just like this

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:28.380
    | text      = And I'm in there with my ex-wife and my son is like a year and a half old, Rex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:36.980
    | text      = And this woman, this fat woman starts turning purple and choking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:42.139
    | text      = Well, I'd gone to the bathroom and I come back out and my ex-wife, wife at the time
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = goes, uh, this woman's choking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:48.579

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:54.659

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:55.860

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:56.860
    | text      = She's starting to fall on the table.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:58.500
    | text      = And I walk over and I go do the Heimlich maneuver and they all look at me like I'm a space alien.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:06.340
    | text      = And back then I was in really good shape.

{{TranscriptBlock
